body.name: Ursa Major Natural Shave Cream | Non-irritating, Vegan and Cruelty-Free | Formulated for Men and Women | 5.3 ounces
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 1 hr 33 mins
features: URSA MAJOR STELLAR SHAVE CREAM - This concentrated, non-lathering natural shaving cream minimizes nicks, cushions against razor burn and naturally nourishes your skin. The sublime texture, robust natural aroma and extraordinary performance will leave you craving your next shave.
CLEAN, HEALTHY INGREDIENTS - Formulated with naturally-derived ingredients including hydrating shea, soothing aloe, conditioning willow bark and toning birch sap.

ZERO SUSPECT CHEMICALS - This natural shave cream is paraben-free, fragrance-free, cruelty-free and vegan. There are no petrochemicals, sulfates, synthetic fragrance or color, glycols, silicones or PEGs.

WHAT TO EXPECT - This is a super nourishing, soap-free shaving cream that offers an unbeatable post-shave feel. The aroma is a subtle coniferous blend with hints of ginger, grapefruit, vetiver and bergamot. Works great for men and women.
GOOD TO KNOW - Great for face, body, wherever. Sulfate-free. Not meant to be used with a brush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I have very sensitive skin. It was very difficult to find great shave cream until I found this one a few years ago. It works well and has a soothing smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product. I’ve been ising it for years.
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is great and well worth it. I’ve been using it for years. I switched to this kind of shaving cream about ten years ago because of the mess and inconvenience of aerosol cans whether foam or gel. I also don’t like having to buy a separate smaller can for flying. I was using a similar product from Neutrogena. Conveniently, these kinds of shaving cream are much better for decreasing irritation as well. I was sent a free sample when I ordered another men’s grooming product on Amazon and was immediately hooked. I’ve been a loyal customer since then. Added benefit: it’s not full of lab-made, complicated chemicals that are illegal in Europe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The more conventional stuff foams up and easily washes away
reviews.reviewText: This is vegan and irritates my face much less than anything else I've tried. However, it's very thick and paste-like. The more conventional stuff foams up and easily washes away. If you use too much, it clogs your razor easily and makes shaving take longer since you're trying to clear out between the blades. If you use less than you're used to using (with other products) it's much more manageable. It's also quite expensive, definitely a bit of a shock if you're coming from like $2.99 shaving cream. I think it's worth it though, if you need a vegan option for sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Will buy again
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried many shave creams/lotions/gels etc. I was recently a devoted customer to a certain name brand until I decided to try something else and I’m so glad I did. I didn’t think I’d like anything better than the previous kind I had used for years but this works, smells, and moisturizes better than any I’ve tried. AND even though it is thick, I haven’t had any issues with it clogging my razor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great stuff and a little goes a long way! Great part of my shaving routine
reviews.reviewText: I love this shaving cream. I shave once a week, my last tube lasted a year. Don’t need much, as this stuff foams up and lathers with a bit of lather. Makes my skin feel soft and smooth shave as well. I use this with my Harry’s brand razor, and I use Bergamot aftershave and it does the job right.Harry’s razor: https://www.amazon.com/Harrys-Blades-Durable-Hinged-Friendly/dp/B07D91SYQJ/ref=mp_s_a_1_2?keywords=harrys&qid=1565757907&s=gateway&sr=8-2Aftershave: https://www.amazon.com/Imperial-Barber-Products-Bergamot-After-Shave/dp/B0125OTICO/ref=mp_s_a_1_3?keywords=bergamot+aftershave+imperial&qid=1565757942&s=gateway&sprefix=bergamot+af&sr=8-3= great morning routine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for sensitive skin, just a little pricey.
reviews.reviewText: My daughter has extremely sensitive skin and was getting horrible razor burn with traditional shaving cream. This has far exceeded exceeded our expectations. No razor burn, helped heal her itchy red skin and moisturized her legs. It’s a little expensive though for the amount you get.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shaving cream
reviews.reviewText: This is the best shaving cream I have used. I do wish they would try to find a different container. Hard to get the product from itStill the best

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Might as well use water. HORRIBLE
reviews.reviewText: Is this clay based? So bizarre. It makes it impossible to shave at all.
